DOC.brief_summary: Preoperative anxiety is a complex clinical concept with both physiological and psychological consequences.
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Anxiety Evaluation: a New Visual Smileys Scale
DOC.detailed_description: This study looks at the need for a more user friendly, rapid tool for measuring preoperative anxiety, specifically by evaluating the visual smileys scale.
DOC.criteria: 18 to 80 years old undergoing surgery at Cedars Sinai Medical Center did not receive sedative or narcotic prior to the interview
DOC.keyword: levels of preoperative anxiety using two different scales
